org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

Class EncFSFileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSFileInfo

  • public class EncFSFileInfo
extends Object
    Class representing information about an underlying file

        name - Name of the file

        lastModified - Last modification time of the file

      • getDecodedFileInfo

        public static EncFSFileInfo getDecodedFileInfo(EncFSVolume volume,
                               String decodedParentPath,
                               String decodedFileName,
                               EncFSFileInfo fileInfo)
        Produces an EncFSFileInfo for the decoded version of the file represented by this object
        Parameters:
        volume - Volume hosting this file
        decodedParentPath - Decoded path of the parent directory for the output file
        decodedFileName - Decoded file name of the output file
        fileInfo - EncFSFileInfo for the file to be decoded
        Returns:
        EncFSFileInfo for the decoded file
